meanings.sent1: She can accomplish her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: He worked hard to accomplish his mission of helping others.
meanings.sent3: With determination, she will accomplish her goal of running a marathon.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled archer, he can accomplish hitting the bullseye every time.
meanings.sent5: The student felt proud to accomplish solving the difficult math problem.

meanings.definition: Successfully complete a task or activity
meanings.sent1: The team will accomplish building the project before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: She managed to accomplish all her chores before dinner.
meanings.sent3: He used his creativity to accomplish finishing the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent4: The chef can accomplish creating a delicious dish with just a few ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The athlete felt relieved to accomplish crossing the finish line first.
